pages.title: About me
pages.text: Bing Wang (ç‹å†°)I am currently a PhD student at Beihang University, supervised by Professor Zhoujun Li. In 2022, I had the opportunity to work as a research intern at at DKI group of Microsoft Research Asia with Jian-Guang Lou and Yan Gao. In 2023, I interned at the AI-Lab at Bytedance under Shuangzhi Wu. Then, in 2024, I was a research intern at the YouTu Lab at Tencent, supervised by Zhao Yan and Di Yin. My research interests include semantic parsing, large language models, and their applications, including LLM-based agents and RAG. Please reach out to me via email: bingwang@buaa.edu.cn.
